event_title: As Loud as a Whisper Can Be

interactivity.requirements: Monday You must be on at least Day  214  to unlock this Event. You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " Kadrillionbilliontrillion " Seen " Everlasting Love " from Ami Arakawa Seen " Maki Miyamura's Mom-Mode Mission " from Maki Miyamura Seen " Bluejay " from Makoto Miyamura Seen " One. Two. Three. " from Miku Maruyama
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Upon fulfilling all Requirements, this Event automatically occurs on the first Monday on or after Day 214.

progression.synopsis: Maya is absent from class (or not, according to Ayane ) and Makoto is asleep. Molly and Tsuneyo report that they talked to the principal about keeping the class together next year — the answer was non-committal, and Sensei decides to ask Makoto if she knows more. When Makoto wakes up, however, she is behaving strangely — Sensei thinks that she hasn't had much sleep and has been crying. She claims to be the same serious, diligent girl as normal, but seems apathetic and reckless. Miku , very concerned for her friend, drags Makoto away to try to sort things out.

event_references.event_default_name: As Loud as a Whisper Can Be

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.11.
